title: Synchrony Car Care
description:
Manage your Synchrony Car Care™ credit card on the go, find retailers and receive special financing and promotional offers. The Synchrony Car Care™ mobile app includes the following features:
Easy Set Up and Login Access
•	New to managing your Synchrony Car Care™ account online? Setup is fast and easy. After downloading, tap on ‘Account’, tap on 'Register' and follow the prompts.
•	Already registered? Connect using your existing online username and password for your Synchrony Car Care™ account.
•	Enable Fingerprint for faster login
Convenient Account Management
•	Make monthly payments to your account.
•	Check your balance and available credit anytime, anywhere.
•	Review your transactions and payments.
•	Securely add multiple bank accounts to pay your Synchrony Car Care™ credit card bill.
•	Manage all your Synchrony Car Care™ credit card accounts with a single login.
Locate Partners Near You
•	Find the closest locations that accept the Synchrony Car Care™ credit card for car repair, auto maintenance, tires, wheels, gas and more.
•	Access special financing offers from Synchrony Car Care™ partner locations at tire dealers, repair centers and car maintenance shops.
description_html:
Manage your Synchrony Car Care™ credit card on the go, find retailers and receive special financing and promotional offers. The Synchrony Car Care™ mobile app includes the following features:

Easy Set Up and Login Access
• New to managing your Synchrony Car Care™ account online? Setup is fast and easy. After downloading, tap on ‘Account’, tap on 'Register' and follow the prompts.
• Already registered? Connect using your existing online username and password for your Synchrony Car Care™ account.
• Enable Fingerprint for faster login

Convenient Account Management
• Make monthly payments to your account.
• Check your balance and available credit anytime, anywhere.
• Review your transactions and payments.
• Securely add multiple bank accounts to pay your Synchrony Car Care™ credit card bill.
• Manage all your Synchrony Car Care™ credit card accounts with a single login.

Locate Partners Near You

• Access special financing offers from Synchrony Car Care™ partner locations at tire dealers, repair centers and car maintenance shops.
